hiveArticle.title: Corona Virus Update - India
hiveArticle.body:
Though India is in an early stage of the Corona Virus outbreak, we still need to be very careful from now on. We need to start Social Distancing as well as reducing going out. 

Along with that, our Prime Minister urged everyone that on Sunday we should observe Janta Curfew for 14 hours. It can be done for numerous reasons. Janata Curfew is voluntarily staying indoors by people themselves. The reasons can be to break the chain of spreading the virus, people get feel of how to stay indoors when the situation worsens i.e. mock drill. 

If anyone wants to know about the cases in India or in their state can refer to the website [https://covidout.in/](https://covidout.in/).

![image.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcSSNNDRytoU1YXBATxWttAvo2kKBsQRBqTPfmJfmwgGj/image.png)
PC : CovidOut

In my case, I am working from home, from the last week and it will continue for at least 2 weeks. We have got enough food to sustain ourselves for 2 weeks just in case.

Be Safe - Be Healthy and Do The Five

![image.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmebxLD81C7sxMScFKzTKaMs8V2JCe4sB5tThXdAmE5bvH/image.png)
PC : IndiaToday
